questions: _   is the grandmother of Jack and Peter.
article:
This is a family tree. It's a very big family. Tim and Gina are very old  . They have   a son, David and a daughter, Sally. David and his wife   Jenny have the twins  , Jack and Bob.
Jack is single  , but Bob is married  . His wife is Lucy. They have a cute   son, Sam. They love   Sam very much.
Sally's husband   is Paul. They are the parents of Peter and Lily. Peter is married .His wife is Jane. They have a daughter. Her name is Kate. Lily has a dog. It's very cute  . She loves   it very much.
